name: Redemption Wristguards
tooltip:
Redemption WristguardsLevel 60

Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Redemption Wristguards if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Wristguards, 6 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 1 Arcanite Bar and 2 Cured Rugged Hides.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Wristguards
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 6
- Arcanite Bar
- Cured Rugged Hide x 2
